original_text:
Magic Mirror Deluxe 2
Se siete appassionati del genere Fantasy di Merkur e avete già provato “Magic Mirror”, la slot gratis Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 vi piacerà ancora di più! Si tratta di una slot a 5 rulli con bobine espandibili durante il giro di giri gratuiti, un elemento da non sottovalutare quando cerchi di realizzare le migliori combinazioni vincenti.

Un gameplay dall’atmosfera magica
Ci sono otto livelli di puntata per giocare a questa slot, il minimo è di soli  0,10€ mentre la scommessa massima arriva fino a 20,00€ a giro. Inoltre, grazie ad un bankroll ben proporzionato, riuscirai a trovare il livello più adatto al tuo modo di giocare rispettando il tuo budget.
Prova le due opzioni principali per aumentare le tue vincite
Nella slot senza registrazione Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 ad ogni giocatore vengono offerte due opzioni per provare ad incrementare le proprie vincite:

la scommessa legata alla carta ti dà la possibilità di scegliere tra rosso o nero,
in alternativa, puoi scegliere di provare ad arrivare fino all’ultimo gradino della scala delle scommesse.


Non perdere di vista gli Scatter e la funzione Bonus di Magic Mirror Deluxe 2
Nella slot senza scaricare Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 sono presenti 3 o più scatter che possono attivare a loro volta la funzionalità speciale del bonus con un simbolo che verrà selezionato random per azionare i giri gratis. Come? Semplicissimo, basta far atterrare 3 o più simboli di dispersione dello specchio in qualsiasi punto della schermata. Se sarai bravo a raggiungere questo obiettivo, riceverai 10 giri gratuiti.
Come si conquistano i giri gratis su Magic Mirror Deluxe 2?
Prima dell’attivazione del bonus, verrà selezionato un simbolo casuale. Questo verrà visualizzato nello specchio e funzionerà come simbolo della bobina in espansione per la durata dei giri gratuiti. Il tuo obiettivo finale deve essere quello di colpire abbastanza simboli da espandere sui rulli e ricevere una vincita maggiore sulle 10 linee di pagamento.

Qualche precisazione sul Round Bonus di questa slot gratis online
Il Round Bonus su Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 si può riattivare ed è qui che puoi potenzialmente ottenere grandi vittorie. Se riattivi la funzione, non solo riceverai altri 10 giri gratuiti, ma otterrai anche un altro simbolo dallo specchio che sarà quindi in grado di espandersi ulteriormente rispetto a quello iniziale.
Qualche considerazione finale sulla mia partita con questa slot
Sul mercato esistono numerose slot online che presentano il rullo in espansione come “Book of Gods” di Big Time Gaming per esempio, ma Magic Mirror Deluxe 2, che è in circolazione da un po’, continua ad essere considerato uno dei giochi con funzione di espansione di bobine più popolari. Prova questa slot in demo o con soldi veri selezionandola dal nostro elenco online.

raw_translation.response:
Magic Mirror Deluxe 2

If you are a true Merkur Fantasy enthusiast and have already experienced the mystical world of "Magic Mirror", then the free slot game Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 will simply blow you away! It's a 5-reel slot with expanding reels during the free spins round, an element that should not be underestimated if you want to summon the best winning combinations. 

Magical Gameplay

There are eight bet levels to choose from in this slot game, starting at an affordable 0.10€ and going up to a whopping 20.00€ per spin. Additionally, thanks to a well-proportioned bankroll, you'll be able to find the right level and play in a way that suits both your style and budget.

Two Main Winning Options

In the no-registration slot game of Magic Mirror Deluxe 2, every player is offered two options to potentially increase their winnings:

- The card-related bet allows you to choose between red and black
- Alternatively, you can decide to climb up the betting ladder and aim for the top.

Do not Lose Sight of the Scatter and Bonus Features in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2

In the no-download game of Magic Mirror Deluxe 2, three or more scatters can activate the special bonus feature with a symbol that will be randomly selected to trigger the free spins. It's simple, all you have to do is to get three or more mirror scatter symbols on the screen to win 10 free spins. 

How to Trigger Free Spins in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2?

Before the bonus feature is activated, a random symbol is selected. This will appear in the mirror and act as the expanding reel symbol for the duration of the free spins. Your ultimate goal is to hit enough symbols to expand the reels and win big on the 10 paylines.

Final Thoughts on My Experience with Magic Mirror Deluxe 2

Many online slots feature an expanding reel, such as "Book of Gods" by Big Time Gaming for example, but the Magic Mirror Deluxe 2, which has been around for a while, continues to be considered one of the most popular reel-expanding games out there. Try this slot in demo or with real money by selecting it from our online list. Good luck!

Are you a fan of Merkur's fantasy genre and have already tried "Magic Mirror"? Well then, you'll love Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 even more! This 5-reel slot game offers expanding reels during free spins, a key element to keep in mind when seeking the best winning combinations.

A magical atmosphere gameplay
This slot game features eight betting levels, with the minimum being only 0.10€ and the maximum reaching up to 20.00€ per spin. With a well-proportioned bankroll, you'll surely find the level that suits your playing style and budget.

Try the two main options to increase your winnings
In the registration-free Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 slot game, two options are available to players for boosting their winnings.

Firstly, the card-based bet offers the chance to choose between red or black.
Alternatively, you can choose to try and reach the final step of the betting scale.

Don't lose sight of the Scatters and Bonus function in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2
With three or more scatter symbols present, the special bonus feature can be activated with a randomly selected symbol triggering the free spins. How? Simply land 3 or more mirror scatter symbols anywhere on the screen and receive 10 free spins. 

How to win free spins on Magic Mirror Deluxe 2?
Before the bonus activation, a random symbol will be selected. This will be displayed in the mirror and will act as the expanding reel symbol for the duration of the free spins. Your ultimate goal is to hit enough symbols to expand across the reels and receive a bigger win on the 10 paylines.

Some clarification on the Bonus Round in this free online slot
The Bonus Round in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 can be reactivated and is where you can potentially achieve big wins. If you reactivate the function, not only will you receive another 10 free spins, but you'll also receive another symbol from the mirror that can expand further than the initial one.

        Review: Are you a fan of Merkur's fantasy genre and have already tried "Magic Mirror"? Well then, you'll love Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 even more! This 5-reel slot game offers expanding reels during free spins, a key element to keep in mind when seeking the best winning combinations.

A magical atmosphere gameplay
This slot game features eight betting levels, with the minimum being only 0.10€ and the maximum reaching up to 20.00€ per spin. With a well-proportioned bankroll, you'll surely find the level that suits your playing style and budget.

Try the two main options to increase your winnings
In the registration-free Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 slot game, two options are available to players for boosting their winnings.

Firstly, the card-based bet offers the chance to choose between red or black.
Alternatively, you can choose to try and reach the final step of the betting scale.

Don't lose sight of the Scatters and Bonus function in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2
With three or more scatter symbols present, the special bonus feature can be activated with a randomly selected symbol triggering the free spins. How? Simply land 3 or more mirror scatter symbols anywhere on the screen and receive 10 free spins. 

How to win free spins on Magic Mirror Deluxe 2?
Before the bonus activation, a random symbol will be selected. This will be displayed in the mirror and will act as the expanding reel symbol for the duration of the free spins. Your ultimate goal is to hit enough symbols to expand across the reels and receive a bigger win on the 10 paylines.

Some clarification on the Bonus Round in this free online slot
The Bonus Round in Magic Mirror Deluxe 2 can be reactivated and is where you can potentially achieve big wins. If you reactivate the function, not only will you receive another 10 free spins, but you'll also receive another symbol from the mirror that can expand further than the initial one.

Final thoughts on my game with this slot
While there are numerous online slot games featuring expanding reels such as Big Time Gaming's "Book of Gods", Magic Mirror Deluxe 2, which has been around for a while, continues to be considered one of the most popular reel expansion games.
